languageCode.title: Code
languageCode.description: Short code description of your language from https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php (eg: Polish = pl)

resetButtonText.title: Reset Button Text
resetButtonText.description: What text do you want to appear on the Reset button before someone switches to your language. Best to put this in your language of choice!  (eg: Zresetuj do języka polskiego)

stringTablePath.title: String table file name
stringTablePath.description: Name of your .csv with all the translations. (eg: https://tinyurl.com/3dehr53j Download polish sheet as a .csv and edit the 3rd column with your translations!)

fontReplacementPaths.title: Font Replacements
fontReplacementPaths.description: Does your language need a font to show? Then you'll need to make a font asset bundle!

Type.title: Font Replace
Type.description: Replace this font in Inscryption with yiour font.

AssetBundlePath.title: Asset Bundle Name
AssetBundlePath.description: Name of the asset bundle you want to load for your font

FontAssetName.title: Font Asset Name
FontAssetName.description: Name of the Font within your asset bundle that you want to use to show.

TMPFontAssetName.title: Text Mesh pro Font Asset Name
TMPFontAssetName.description: Name of the Font within your asset bundle that you want to use to show.
